What about Ant makes it difficult to manage widely-ranging dependencies and=
 tasks? If Ant can do what make can do, when why is Ant any less suited to =
building the JDK/JVM than make?

>So said Timothy Wall on 4/27/2003 -------=
-------------
>Aside from neither of these existing when they originally se=
t up the 
>build and test processes, ant is less suited than make to managi=
ng a 
>large, complex project that consists of a wide range dependencies an=
d 
>tasks.  Can you imaging trying to use ant to build a VM?
>

, April 26, 2003, at 04:46 AM, javainsel wrote:

ked the archive which I've downloaded, I discovered that
